articles.author: Deon J. Hampton
articles.title: Historic Biltmore Estate shutters after floods from Hurricane Helene ravage Asheville - NBC News
articles.description: America’s largest privately-owned estate has abruptly shut down in Asheville after Hurricane Helene caused extensive flooding and building damage along the 8,000 acre property.
articles.content:
ASHEVILLE, N.C. Americas largest privately-owned estate has abruptly shut down in Asheville after Hurricane Helene caused extensive flooding and building damage along the 8,000 acre property.
